--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> Doc: Ravenchief, if you want to look from above, you're welcome. I'll
> join the boat patrol and try to refit the scanners so we can see if
> he's underwater.
> 
> He plunges from great height, not noticing a metal bird as he does.
> Still scanning the sea's surface, his left rear wheel is about to
> collide with Myrmidon...

OOC: I am sorry if I am being too much of a stickler, however ... keep
in mind that Myrmidon is probrably sitting at 10,000 feet in the air ..
give or take a few thousand. To most of you he is just an odd somewhat
bird shaped dot. Rodimus can see him because he has fancy extended
vision. However I believe it would be difficult for a Flying Delorean
to reach that altitude, never mind do it by accident. I am not sure of
the specifications of your character or vehicle, so I don't want to
crazy about it, but that just seems to be a bit too casual. At the very
least it would take a few moments to reach that high, and Myrmidon
would have just moved .. having watched Doc appraoch for some time. 

If I am off base here please let me know.

Please feel free to shoot at me, point at me, ignore me, or even tell
the base systems to shoot the eagle out of the sky. (the base computer
still sees an avian).  

I am open for all. I must admit thought that it does feel a bit odd
telling you folks to shoot at me, but hey it's all in fun!!

Preston
(Myrmidon)
